content.rendered:
Options that work for everyone.

Whether you’re looking for a doctor’s visit for yourself, or for a backup plan for your family, we’ve got you covered.

This page describes the fees that apply for general practitioner services not covered by provincial governments. Fees may not apply if you have benefits coverage through your insurer or employer, or if your consultation includes only provincially-funded services. Click here to learn more.

For pricing in Quebec, click here.

Get started

Pay-per-visit

One-time visits for you or a loved one, if your doctor isn’t available.

Medical membership plans

Year-round care for you, or your entire family.

Credit packages

Discount packages to manage your health and your wallet.

Pay-per-visit

One-time visits for you or a loved one, if your doctor isn’t available.

Get started

Medical membership plans

Year-round care for you, or your entire family.

Get started

Credit packages

Discount packages to manage your health and your wallet.

Get started
Why do I have to pay if I’m Canadian?

Fees apply for services that aren’t covered by your province unless you have additional benefits coverage from your employer or insurer.

Learn more

What’s included in the fee?

24/7 coverage

Our doctors are available to you instantly, at any time of the day.

1:1 time with the doctor

You’ll receive an assessment, diagnosis, and treatment, including prescriptions as necessary.

Physician triage

Doctors review every request on Maple; if they can’t help, they’ll let you know right away, and you will not be charged.

Prescriptions / delivery

Easy pick-up at a local pharmacy or free delivery, Canada wide.

Access for you & family members

You can keep track of your family’s healthcare all under one Maple account.

Free storage of health records

Maple makes it easy to add your past medical records, so you can get the care you need from our doctors.

Digital consultation summaries

Keep a digital record of each consultation and can share it with your family physician.

On-demand, live chat customer support

We’re always here to help; if you’re stuck, or have a question, simply message us at support@getmaple.ca.

Get started today.

Registration is free and our online medical consultations are covered under many existing private Healthcare Spending Accounts or benefits plans if provincial coverage doesn’t apply for your visit.

Sign up
